data.name: Satellite - OST
data.detailed_description:
OST includes 40 high-quality ogg tracks, that were created by 5 different artists and 2 vocalists. The tracks of various genres are united in one general idea and beauty of the sound.

1) Aki Kato - Another Day
2) Aki Kato - Break From Stars
3) Aki Kato - But Mind Is Free
4) Aki Kato - Cantina Joke
5) Aki Kato - Dance On The Shaft
6) Aki Kato - Dream Of Future
7) Aki Kato - Era Of Light
8) Aki Kato - Feeling You
9) Aki Kato - Goodbye Earth
10) Aki Kato - Maybe This Is The End
11) Aki Kato - Monster Heart
12) Aki Kato - My Darkness
13) Aki Kato - Orange Morning
14) Aki Kato - Pointless
15) Aki Kato - Re-Creation Of Memory
16) Aki Kato - Resolved
17) Aki Kato - Too Far
18) Aki Kato - Tragedy Of Me
19) Aki Kato - Tragedy Of The World
20) Aki Kato - Years Of Patience
21) Helly Tree - Addicted
22) Helly Tree - Aspirin
23) Helly Tree - Light
24) Helly Tree - Light (minus)
25) Helly Tree - Star Children
26) Kharaktic - Battle
27) Kharaktic - Inspiration
28) Kharaktic - Journey
29) Kharaktic - The War
30) Kharaktic vs Jackie-O - Barren
31) TERNOX - Action
32) TERNOX - Anxiety
33) TERNOX - Demo3
34) TERNOX - Horror1
35) TERNOX - Horror3
36) TERNOX - Muzoniy
37) TERNOX - Night Improvisation
38) tieff - After The Battle
39) tieff - Bad News
40) tieff - Dark Matter
41) tieff - Everyday

data.short_description: OST includes 40 high-quality mp3 tracks, that were created by 5 different artists and 2 vocalists. The tracks of various genres are united in one general idea and beauty of the sound.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP SP3
  • Processor: Intel Atom 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 or better
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Better then Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: core 4.2
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: core 4.2
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
